input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard

Item features:
44 Inch steel framed acrylic backboard
The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 Inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. Includes a white, all-weather net.
The Ratchet lift provides rim height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments
Three pieces 3 Inch round pole
35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand for stability
The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Have fun with the family with this portable basketball hoop from Spalding. The 44 inch acrylic backboard is made of steel and is very durable. The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 Inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet. The 35-gallon capacity base is filled with water or sand for stability. The three pieces 3 Inch round pole and white, all-weather net make this hoop great for outdoor use.
input_text.Response B: The Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop has a 44 inch acrylic backboard, a Slam jam breakaway rim, a ratchet lift for adjusting the rim height, and a 35-gallon base for stability. The portable basketball hoop adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
